summary: The Boston Celtics are a famous basketball team from Boston, Massachusetts. They are the most successful team in the NBA, winning 18 championships! The team was founded in 1946 and started winning big in the 1950s with players like Bill Russell. They won 8 titles in a row! In the 1980s, a new "Big Three" of Larry Bird, Kevin McHale, and Robert Parish brought more wins. After some tough times, the Celtics formed another "Big Three" with Paul Pierce, Ray Allen, and Kevin Garnett, winning the title in 2008. Recently, they won again in 2024. The Celtics have a big rivalry with the Los Angeles Lakers.
title: Boston Celtics
